body.name: ZINUS 13 Inch Euro Top Pocket Spring Hybrid Mattress / Pressure Relief / Pocket Innersprings for Motion Isolation / Bed-in-a-Box, Full,White

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized from its compressed state.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding

LAYERED TO PERFECTION - A foolproof combination of individually wrapped iCoil innersprings and supportive foams topped with a dreamy, microfiber quilted cover add up to undisturbed, restorative sleep that’ll have you daydreaming about bedtime

SUPPORTIVE FOAM & POCKET SPRINGS – Layers of soft comfort foam, durable high density foam and motion-isolating iCoil pocket springs with a quilted, microfiber top; ideal for back sleepers and average weight to plus-sized sleepers
OEKO-TEX CERTIFIED – This mattress conforms to Europe’s highest standards and meets OEKO-TEX requirements to be free of harmful chemicals and substances

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
body.description: If an exceptional mattress that offers both customized support and luxurious comfort is on your list, look no further than this Euro Top Pocket Spring Hybrid Mattress. With its marshmallowy microfiber eurotop and innovative pocketed iCoils, this all-around favorite is what dreams are made of. Offering tailored spinal alignment and uninterrupted rest through the magic of our independently wrapped iCoil innersprings, this model precisely adjusts to your body’s every curve. iCoils also ensure that your sleeping partner won’t wake up, no matter how many times during the night you roll over, sprawl out or kick off the covers (although we doubt you’ll do much of that on top of this supremely comfortable mattress!). To top it off, precisely chosen layers of conforming comfort foam and supportive high-density foam add up to a feel that’s not too firm and not too soft, but somewhere perfectly in between. And let’s not forget its microfiber euro top with a quilted premium cover that essentially looks and feels like a layer of tiny pillows! This mattress is OEKO-TEX certified, meaning it measures up to Europe’s highest standards and is free of harmful substances. Plus, you can bet that this mattress is backed by our 10 year worry-free warranty. In case there are any faults in the materials you receive or any kind of manufacturing defect, we'll make sure you are taken care of as fast as you can say, “There’s a box on my doorstep.” A supportive bed backed by a truly supportive promise, now that’s what we call innovative sleep.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: DO NOT REMOVE OR WASH . Spot Clean only. To spot clean, Vacuum your mattress, sprinkle some baking soda on it. Use a scrub brush to gently rub the powder into the mattress and leave it for 10 minutes or so. Vacuum the excess powder. Do not wash. Do not use bleach. Do not machine dry.Do not iron.Do not dry clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally - an affordable, firm mattress
reviews.reviewText: As a man of gravity (approaching 300lb) I look for a mattress that’s decidedly on the firm side. I can’t speak for everyone, but this was exactly what I was looking for to provide firm (but still comfortably soft) support.Out of the box, the top layer of foam did look rumpled and lumpy beneath the mattress cover. But by the end of the first night, everything was settled and smooth. (Make sure to let it unroll and rise fully in one place before trying to move it - I think trying to move it while it was expanding was my mistake.)After just one night, I feel morerested than I have in years of sleeping in memory foam and soft “hybrid” mattresses. It doesn’t seem to sleep hot - I’m like a space heater but this passed the sweat test in a 74° room. Dry and comfortable all night.For my weight, this mattress is great in any sleep position: side, stomach and back all feel natural. It has just enough sink so that my behind is flush with my spine if I’m on my back, which no mattress has ever managed to do for me before. If you’re on the lighter side, this might not be the same for you, but again, just speaking for my own size.The quilted top doesn’t have large divots like some mattresses, and the top layer of foam is just thick enough to feel plush without the marshmallow/quicksand feel of the Zinus memory foam mattresses. Great edge support too - sleeping on my side it felt stable right up to the edge. I wouldn’t sit on it to put my shoes on, though… it smashes flat under my weight in a sitting position.All in all, an extraordinary mattress for the price, and one I hope to keep for years. Hope this helps, big dudes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had to replace my mattress because the dog peed on it >.<. I bought Zinus before for my guest room and knew it was good for the price. I admit being a bit sad because my old mattress was really nice quality and very comfortable- I thought Serta? Beautyrest? But needs must, so I bought the Queen Zinus. As I was removing the old mattress I checked the tag- And it was ZINUS!!! Sure enough, swapped the mattresses, and no change in quality of sleep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars To anyone considering this mattress-I highly recommend!
reviews.reviewText: To anyone considering this mattress-I highly recommend! It is a very good bed for a very good price! It is soft yet firm I don’t feel like I’m sleeping on a hardwood floor but I also don’t feel like I’m sinking. It has a bit of a firm memory foam feel. The only reason why I’m giving four stars is because the sides are a little weak. My husband and I both don’t weigh very much, I am 125 pounds and he’s about 141- so it’s fine. But I imagine if someone had a lot of weight to them and they sat on the edge of the bed, they would feel like they would slide off.However a little bit of annoying the sides might be, it is not a dealbreaker! This is a really good bed! Super good quality!!!Don’t be intimidated when it comes and there’s a huge bubble in the middle that lasts for about three days, not a big deal, it goes away. And I highly recommend giving it the 72 hours to completely come to its size. Happy sleeping!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mattress Ever...
reviews.reviewText: Me and the hubs love this mattress...it came very quickly (2 days after we ordered) 8am in the morning. Had no trouble getting it unboxed, enjoyed the directions so much...perfect for my hubs. We had so things to do that Saturday so once we got it on top of our box springs we headed out for the day. When we returned 5 hours later the mattress looked perfect, we put sheets, blankets and pillows on it. It had filled out completely no bumps or sags...it looked very inviting. So a few hours later we were finally ready to try our new mattress out...it is firmer than I expected which is not a bad thing. I have some major nerve pain issues due to a former tumor on my spine. Laying down is never comfortable for me so I wasn't expecting much. My hubs twists and turns and has 6 pillows he uses to prop himself up with in various ways. The first night was different, I slept, I woke at 5am to take meds and realized that was the first time I had waken all night...the hubs said he slept great, but he always says that and can sleep anyplace. Thought I'd give it some time, so here we are a month later...I am definitely sleeping better, and waking up feeling rested. I actually get comfortable at night. Hubs is down to using 2 pillows, he says the firmer mattress gives more support and he doesn't need the pillows now. We are very pleased. By the way, hubs is a big guy 6'4, 350lbs, before when he roll over I knew it, now I don't even notice. It's very nice, we are very pleased. I wasn't sure about a mattress that came in a box but it's wonderful. We are going to purchase another for our son. We love it, definitely recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am very surprised!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new bed for an apartment, where do I start? One friend recently found a good deal at mattress firm and another friend bought a zinus mattress from Amazon. I went to mattress firm to see what was there and it waaay out of budget. So went to my friends house to check out here bed and it was nice. I could not believe what came from a box... So I tried to order the same but it was out of stock and I needed one asap... So I purchased this one, same company as hers.The box arrived in decent shape. It was heave, but not as heavy as the frame I ordered to go with it. I let the mattress decompress after opening it for 2 days. I had back surgery a few years ago, I life a firm mattress. This one is not as firm as I would think I want, but it more than firm enough. Medium plus. I have no issues sleeping on it. The middle edge will sink some when you sit on it, getting up this morning I notices... But the ends are firm and the corners are firm. The mattress makes no noise from the springs or anything. From sleeping to other things you do on a bed, I have no complaints.I was on the fence, waited around, worried about me messing up my back more being cheap. That was not the case. I am actually very, very happy and surprised with the bed. I give it 5 stars because it exceeded my expectations. I am sleeping comfortably and do not feel bad about my purchase. I let my budget lead and this time, it was right. Makes me really think about the overpriced mattress market. The other really expensive mattresses are nice, but you will pay 8 times or more what I paid here for one. I have no regrets and WILL buy again.
